user_query: What are different perspectives on climate change policies

strategy_used: Graph Strategy: We currently have no Twitter-derived data about how different actors frame climate change policies. The next round should fill that core gap by collecting (a) representative tweets across time (Top + Latest) to identify dominant frames and emerging narratives, (b) official and activist timelines to capture institutional vs. grassroots policy perspectives, and (c) audience/follower signals and trending topics to understand salience and partisan or regional patterns. To meet the investigation constraints, I will use multiple endpoint types (search, timeline, trends, followers, affilates) so results are complementary and enable mapping of perspectives, influence, and networks.
